attributes.action: Make police officers wear Comic "red noses" and "giant floppy boots"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The police forces of the UK are very boring, Brighten up their day, they could mount noddy car patrols, Armed juggling, storm buildings using bananas and silly string.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
